TopicTitle: research screen won't lode (gfx driver update)

Articles.Content: I jest started to play KSP and in career mode when iI click on R/D the game locks up and I'm unable to research anything so I'm unable to unlcock anything and continue with career mode is this a bug or some thing

> 
> after i click the R/D button it comes up then the screen go's black after a min. or so i get the blue screen of death

I'm wondering if you're using the latest WHQL-approved (or at least officially released) drivers for your graphics card. The latest Intel drivers for the Aspire 4720Z on the Acer website (at least the European section) are v7.14.10.1409, however you're using v7.14.10.1436. The latest drivers for the 965 Express family of GPUs for Vista 32 bit on Intel's website are v15.12.4.1666, and should be [available here](https://downloadcenter.intel.com/product/81508/Mobile-Intel-965-Express-Chipset-Family).

I'm not sure if this will fix the problem or not, but the last lines of your output log do seem to suggest something very wrong going on with the GPU. I'd also suggest turning any detail level options in the game right down, as the 965 Express chipset is old, and wasn't all that much of a "gaming" chipset when it was new.
that did it thanks for the help i thot i had 1666 installed but thin i jest put darped a new HD in it so i may not had put 1666 back in
